headline: Sr. Software QA Engineer
specialties: Software Quality Assurance, Automation, Cucumber, RubyMine, TeamCity, InelliJ, Software Development Life Cycle, Agile, Functional/UI, Blackbox/Greybox/API/Web Services testing,  Test Plan/Design/Cases/Scenarios, Bug Tracking System, JIRA, Web/Client-Server Application, Windows, UNIX, Linux, Shell, HTML, XML, Visual Studio, C#, Java, Selenium, JUnit, HTTPUnit, Eclipse, Oracle, SQLDeveloper, MySQL, SequelPro, QTP, WinRunner, SilkTest, VMWare, JProtection, JAWS, Code Coverage, SVN, TFS, Networking.
summary:
-	Extensive experience in Software Quality Assurance in all stages of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).

-	Track record of effective participation and innovative contribution in vital stages of testing complex Web-based enterprise scale applications in different OS platforms (Windows, UNIX), Browsers (Internet Explorer, Firefox, Google Chrome, Opera, Safari), Databases (Oracle, Informix).

-	Ability to work independently and as a team member, rapidly consume domain knowledge and determine comprehensive, meaningful tests.
